page.title: 04Housing.
page.content: Housing in our area falls into the following categories: Housing Association: 1 Rented:25 Owner occupied: 210 Farms: 14 Holiday homes: 37 Hotels: 1 Council Houses: 43 Pubs: 1 Service cottages 3 Empty: 6 In 1985 Timberscombe set up a Housing Association with a seven member committee.They plan to build 10 housing units in the village on a site already available with outline planning permission.It is hoped that this development will attract young families to the area.The houses will be for rent.The Local Athority will be responsible for the nomination of half the tenants and the Association for the other half.The Association are at present awaiting recognition by the Housing Commission but they hope that building will commence during 1986.
